Question.Subject: How do I get a prize with PTZ on Lockerz.com?
Question.Content: I clicked on Redeem button but the items over there aren't clickable. Do I need to contact Lockerz to get my prize?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
No. Lockerz have redemptions once a month. There not announced and last only about 30sec. Its possible but very difficult to get a good prize.
Just a suggestion if looking for another free prize winning site. Swagbucks! Prizes are always in stock and anyone can win them. Swagbucks is just a search engine like google, but you randomly win swagbucks for searching the web. Theres other ways of getting bucks too! I usually buy amazon.com gift cards. Ive made over $100 in alittle time. Try it out- http://www.swagbucks.com/refer/Rundee
